trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Galt
There were no other sightings in Galt on or around September 15th 2012
Summary: saw 2 orange round ufos that wher maybe 1000 ft up and the one hit the othere one
divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 8:20 at night I was in my back yard adding chlorine to my hot tub when I looked west and saw 2 bright Orange circles coming east within 50 feet of each other 1000 feet off the ground. As they were over my house one hit the other causing it to lunge forward as I was watching the was no sound at all and no crash. I went to take a picture of them with my phone and as I hit the button to take tohe pic my phone just shut down. I ran inside to get my wife and by the tile I got back outside they were no where to be seen.
